personalInfo.name: Tayyub Yaqoob
personalInfo.title: Digital Analyst | AI/ML Solutions Engineer | Data & Crypto Enthusiast
personalInfo.summary: Digital Analyst with 5+ years of experience in data analytics, automation, and AI/ML. I deliver scalable pipelines, forecasting engines, MMM models, anomaly detection systems, and crypto/DeFi insights. I also freelance as a data consultant, write for Cointelegraph, and actively invest toward financial freedom.

experience.title: Digital Analyst
experience.description: Lead analytics and AI/ML projects for global clients across organic and paid media. Deliver AI-powered insights, automation, and forecasting.
achievements: Built 6 Codex AI modules (Forecasting, Query Forecast, Sitemap Analysis, Anomaly Detection, Synergy Analysis, Sentiment Analysis).
Implemented GA4 + BigQuery pipelines and automated reporting.
Delivered GA4 audits, Advanced Consent Mode V2, and GTM automation.
Worked on data retainers for Neilson Holidays, Clogau, Rivet Education, Tesco Bank, Royal London, and more.

experience.title: Data & AI Consultant
experience.description: Freelance consulting on advanced data workflows, GA4/GTM, AI/ML, and automation.
achievements: Scaled client workloads using AWS Lambda, Fargate, and EC2.
Automated Looker Studio dashboards and MMM pipelines.
Delivered bespoke GA4 + CRM integrations for multiple clients.

experience.title: Contributor (as Callum Reid)
experience.description: Crypto/AI content writer publishing deep-dive research articles.
achievements: Published 25+ articles on AI, DeFi, stablecoins, and crypto trading bots.
Specialized in AI-powered crypto trading, stablecoin depegging, and fraud detection.
